remarks: Express a two-argument function as a one-argument function, or vice-versa.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mpt2mpt.1 $e |- ( z = <. x , y >. -> C = D ) $.
mpt2mpt $p |- ( z e. ( A X. B ) |-> C ) = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> D ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y $.
$d D z $.
